程序包 consoleVersion1

类 Prey

java.lang.Object
consoleVersion1.Robot
consoleVersion1.Prey
public class Prey extends Robot
Prey class represents a robot that tries to survive in a robot arena.
作者:
Zichen Liao

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Prey(double bx, double by, double angle)
    Constructor to initialize the prey with its position and angle.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Prey

      public Prey(double bx, double by, double angle)
      Constructor to initialize the prey with its position and angle.
      参数:
      bx - the x-coordinate of the prey
      by - the y-coordinate of the prey
      angle - the initial angle of the prey

  • 方法详细资料

    • tryToMove

      public void tryToMove(RobotArena arena)
      从类复制的说明: Robot
      Abstract method for moving the robot in the specified arena.
      指定者:
      tryToMove 在类中 Robot
      参数:
      arena - the arena in which the robot is trying to move

    • shouldSplit

      public boolean shouldSplit()
      Checks if the prey should split based on survival counter.
      返回:
      true if the prey should split, false otherwise

    • resetSurvivalCounter

      public void resetSurvivalCounter()
      Resets the survival counter.

    • isMarkedForRemoval

      public boolean isMarkedForRemoval()
      Checks if the prey is marked for removal.
      返回:
      true if marked for removal, false otherwise

    • markForRemoval

      public void markForRemoval()
      Marks the prey for removal.
